content: The Green-Capped Martialist is an optional and secret Character Boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. This boss can only be fought by undertaking a Treasure Hunter's Quest that begins along the Bitter Lake and leads to the Valley of Ecstasy, where you'll have to uncover a secret Melon Field.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist'.
The content is as follows:
The Green-Capped Martialist is an optional and secret Character Boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. This boss can only be fought by undertaking a Treasure Hunter's Quest that begins along the Bitter Lake and leads to the Valley of Ecstasy, where you'll have to uncover a secret Melon Field.
